Files Headings

index.js

 
#!/usr/bin/env node

Invokes the terminal "beep" sound once per second on every exact second.

 
process.title = 'beep'

var cursor = require('../../')(process.stdout)

function beep () {
  cursor.beep()
  setTimeout(beep, 1000 - (new Date()).getMilliseconds())
}

setTimeout(beep, 1000 - (new Date()).getMilliseconds())
